newsitem.title: USA: SA Telecommunications names Curd chairman.
newsitem.headline: SA Telecommunications names Curd chairman.

text.p: SA Telecommunications said Monday, that it has named Howard Curd as the chairman of its board of directors. Curd replaces Jack Matz, who resigned as chairman and chief executive officer. The company told Reuters that currently there is no search for a new chief executive officer.
Matz, the company said in a statement, will remain a company director and consultant.

Curd also currently serves as the chief executive officer of Jesup & Lamont Capital Holdings, Inc., a diversified financial holdings company. SA Telecommunications said he has been one of its directors since Sept 1995.
